amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-247 to add refresher training no less than every 2 years for local, Tribal, State, or Federal law enforcement agencies who have access to beneficial ownership information to ensure the privacy of beneficial owners.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
